titles.title: A bill to amend the Legislative Branch Appropriation Act, 1979, as reenacted, to extend the duration of the Office of Classified National Security Information within the Office of the Secretary of the Senate, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 3/3/1987--Introduced. Amends the Legislative Branch Appropriations Act, 1979 to extend the duration of the Office of Classified National Security Information within the Office of the Secretary of the Senate until June 5, 1987.
